column.name: AlertType
column.summary: Enum:AlertType Identifies what types of alert this row is assocaited to.

Enumeration.name: AlertType
Enumeration.EnumValue: 31 - Alert HQ that a push hub client has reached its failure threshold or all push hub clients are failing

column.name: Type
column.summary: Enum:AlertType Identifies what type of alert this row is.

Enumeration.name: AlertType
Enumeration.EnumValue: 31 - Alert HQ that a push hub client has reached its failure threshold or all push hub clients are failing

column.name: TemplateFailureAutoReply
column.summary: Used when auto replying to appointment confirmations that failed.

column.name: EraAutomationOverride
column.summary: Enum:EraAutomationMode UseGlobal (0) by default. Determines the level of ERA processing automation for this carrier. This will override the EraAutomationBehavior preference when not set to UseGlobal.

Enumeration.name: EraAutomationMode
Enumeration.summary: The level of automation for ERA processing. This setting can be overriden for individual Carriers.
Enumeration.EnumValue: 0 - Never used for the EraAutomationBehavior preference. Only used for Carrier.EraAutomationOverride to indicate that the carrier uses the EraAutomationBehavior preference instead of an override.
2 - Allows ERAs to be processed with a single button click.

column.name: PlanNote
column.summary: Note for this plan.

column.name: ExamFreqLimit
column.summary: Number of Procedures allowed for a discount plans Exam category.

column.name: XrayFreqLimit
column.summary: Number of Procedures allowed for a discount plans X-Ray category.

column.name: ProphyFreqLimit
column.summary: Number of Procedures allowed for a discount plans Prophylaxis category.

column.name: FluorideFreqLimit
column.summary: Number of Procedures allowed for a discount plans Fluoride category.

column.name: PerioFreqLimit
column.summary: Number of Procedures allowed for a discount plans Periodontal category.

column.name: LimitedExamFreqLimit
column.summary: Number of Procedures allowed for a discount plans Limited Exam category.

column.name: PAFreqLimit
column.summary: Number of Procedures allowed for a discount plans Periapical X-Ray category.

column.name: AnnualMax
column.summary: Annual discount maximum for frequency limitations. -1 indicates blank or no annual max limitation.

column.name: SubNote
column.summary: Note for this sub.

column.name: SentOrReceived
column.summary: Enum:EmailSentOrReceived Neither, Received, Read, WebMailReceived, WebMailRecdRead, WebMailSent, WebMailSentRead, SentDirect, ReceivedEncrypted, ReceivedDirect, ReadDirect, AckDirectProcessed, AckDirectNotSent

column.name: FailReason
column.summary: Reason the message failed to send. Blank if sent successful.

column.name: LogSource
column.summary: Enum:LogSources

Enumeration.name: LogSources
Enumeration.summary: Known entities that create security logs.
Enumeration.EnumValue: 22 - X12 834 Employer Import from the Manage Module.

column.name: EServiceType
column.summary: Enum:eServiceType

Enumeration.name: eServiceType
Enumeration.summary: List of some possible eService Actions.
Enumeration.EnumValue: 0. This means the action done was Unknown.
1. This means the action done was a Web Sched Recall.
2. This means the action done was for a New Patient.
3. This means the action done was for an Existing Patient.
4. This means the action done was for a Web Sched ASAP.
5. This means the action done was for a Patient Portal.
6. This means the action done was for a Mobile Checkin.
7. This means the action done was for a Appointment Confirmations.
8. This means the action done was for a WebForm.
9. This means the action done was for unspecified WebSched.
10. This means the action done was for Arrivals.

column.name: EServiceAction
column.summary: Enum:eServiceAction

Enumeration.name: eServiceAction
Enumeration.EnumValue: 0 - Should not be in the database.
2 - Patient chooses between new/existing/recall appointment on home view.
4 - Patient arrives at the scheduler page.
5 - Patient switches months in the timeslot picker.
17 - Payment was made in payment portal.

column.name: KeyType
column.summary: Enum:FKeyType

column.name: LogGuid
column.summary: Guid for logging actions with no associated PatNum.

column.name: ClinicNum
column.summary: Clinic Number.

column.name: FKey
column.summary: FKey for given type.

column.name: EServiceCode
column.summary: Enum:eServiceCode EService that this short GUID applies to.

Enumeration.name: eServiceCode
Enumeration.summary: Used by EServiceSignal.ServiceCode. Each service will have an entry here. Stored as an int for forward compatibility.

column.name: PermType
column.summary: Enum:Permissions

Enumeration.name: Permissions
Enumeration.summary: A hard-coded list of permissions which may be granted to usergroups.
Enumeration.EnumValue: 206 - Permission to allow users to login to ODCloud from any IP Address.

column.name: PermType
column.summary: Enum:Permissions

Enumeration.name: Permissions
Enumeration.summary: A hard-coded list of permissions which may be granted to usergroups.
Enumeration.EnumValue: 206 - Permission to allow users to login to ODCloud from any IP Address.

column.name: LogSource
column.summary: Enum:LogSources None, WebSched, InsPlanImport834, FHIR, PatientPortal.

Enumeration.name: LogSources
Enumeration.summary: Known entities that create security logs.
Enumeration.EnumValue: 22 - X12 834 Employer Import from the Manage Module.

column.name: ServiceType
column.summary: Enum:TsiServiceType - for placements, this is the type of collection activity that will start on the account being placed.

Enumeration.name: TsiServiceType
Enumeration.summary: Don't remove items or alter order of this enum, FKey requires this to be static.

column.name: FkeyType
column.summary: Enum:UserOdFkeyType Specifies which flag is overridden for the specified definition, since an individual definition can have multiple flags.

Enumeration.name: UserOdFkeyType
Enumeration.summary: These FKey Types are to be used as an identifier for what table the Fkey column is associated to, or what type of override it is. Not always associated to a database table. Example: TaskCollapse,SuppressLogOffMessage,AcctProcBreakdown. This enum is not stored as a string so DO NOT reorder it.
Enumeration.EnumValue: 25 - Preference only applies to the wiki search. Set and unset only in the wiki search window. Box defaults to checked if this preference is not set.
